description: This file defines React functional components for layout and icon rendering in a web application. Specifically, it includes a Layout component with sidebar, topbar, and main content, as well as an Icon component that renders inline SVG icons based on a name prop.

methods.name: Layout({ navItems, activeNavId, onNavChange, topbar, children })
methods.description: A React component that provides the application shell layout with a sidebar, topbar, and main content area. It accepts navigation items, active navigation state, a callback for navigation changes, a topbar component, and children content.

methods.name: Icon({ name })
methods.description: A React component that renders inline SVG icons based on the provided 'name' property. It supports icons such as 'dashboard', 'records', 'settings', 'search', and 'plus'.

ctags.name: Layout
ctags.pattern: /^export function Layout({ navItems, activeNavId, onNavChange, topbar, children }) {$/
